title: Vespa Product Updates, December 2018 - ONNX Import and Map Attribute Grouping
description:
yahoodevelopers:

Today we’re kicking off a blog post series of need-to-know updates on Vespa, summarizing the features and fixes detailed in Github issues.

We welcome your contributions and feedback about any new features or improvements you’d like to see.

For December, we’re excited to share the following product news:

Streaming Search Performance Improvement

Streaming Search is a solution for applications where each query only searches a small, statically determined subset of the corpus. In this case, Vespa searches without building reverse indexes, reducing storage cost and making writes more efficient. With the latest changes, the document type is use
